page.title: 20Future Developments.
page.content: Our area is noted for its farms,but as farmers get bigger and better machines they are employing fewer and fewer people. British Rail in Crewe employs a lot of people still, and so does Rolls Royce, but these places can not be relied on to provide us with jobs for when we leave school. Our local Borough is trying to encourage tourism as an industry.We live in an interesting area and we hope that people will come and see the places that we have described. { CREDITS.} Lodgefields County Primary School,Crewe produced the first ten pages. Underwood West County Junior School,Crewe produced the rest.Both schools joined forces to share the Data Count. Underwood West took the photographs.
